verses.name: Numbers 29:23
verses.text: And on the fourth day ten bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish:

verses.name: Numbers 29:24
verses.text: Their meat offering and their drink offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the manner:

verses.name: Numbers 29:25
verses.text: And one kid of the goats for a sin offering; beside the continual burnt offering, his meat offering, and his drink offering.

verses.name: Numbers 29:26
verses.text: And on the fifth day nine bullocks, two rams, and fourteen lambs of the first year without spot:
